Physics

Sometimes you feel on top of the world knowing that all the mathematics you study explain beautifuly natureâ€™s behavior, feeling privileged by simply being able to understand concepts that took the human mind hundreds, if not thousands of years to discover; others you feel like crap wondering if this or that concept will ever make sense to you given its difficulty. Itâ€™s a pretty interesting (but also challenging) jorney, to be honest.
